attributes.action: Change McDonald’s breakfast finishing time from 11am to 12pm.
attributes.additional_details: we want parliament to do this to gasification for those who may want brunch or a later breakfast as 12pm is the cut off point for lunch, as less people will want a cheese burger over pancakes or muffins.
attributes.background: we want McDonald’s breakfast timing to be extended from 11am to 12pm.

rejection.details:
Petitions must call for a specific action that the UK Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about when hospitality businesses offer particular menu items for sale are a matter for the proprietor, not the Government or Parliament. As a result it is not possible for the Government or Parliament to take the action you have requested.
